work.summary: Manage English and Spanish inbound calls from clients, dealerships, banks, and other departments. Lead meetings with department messages and training. Assist with policies, payments and troubleshoot app login.
Assist Faculty with grading HTML5 and CSS exercises. Review web development process through research of code, best practices and case studies.
Track student participation. Act as source of knowledge for students based on past coursework experience. Review UX practices such as personas, heuristic checklists and website design.

Leadership role in which I manage Pediatric Endocrinology office and assist with Doctor interviews and proposals for hire. Work with a small team to start and manage a Fetal Care Program involving multiple hospital specialties.

activities.name: Member of AIGA Student and Phoenix chapter
